【考法 1】 adj. 病态的： being such to a degree that is extreme, excessive, or markedly abnormal
【例】 She has a pathological fear of snakes. 她对蛇有一种病态的恐惧
【近】 abnormal, aberrant, anomalous, morbid
【反】 normal 正常的；natural 自然的
【记】pathology from Greek pathos "suffering" (see pathos) + -logia "study" (see -logy).
